full_summary:
# Office Furniture Tender Announcement

**Title**:
The Canadian Army, Department of National Defence, is seeking proposals for the procurement of office furniture to support its operations in Ottawa, Ontario.

**Reference Number**:
cb-411-71710028

**Solicitation Number**:
W3372-255052

**Publication Date**:
November 22, 2024

**Tender Closing Date**:
December 5, 2024 @ 14:00:00

**Contract Details**:

* **Expected Contract Start Date**: January 31, 2025
* **Expected Contract End Date**: March 31, 2025

**Notice Type**:
Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Category**:
Goods and Services (GD)

**Procurement Method**:
Competitive, Open Bidding

**Selection Criteria**:
The lowest price will be the deciding factor for the award of the contract.

**Delivery Location**:
Ottawa, Ontario, Canada

**Contact Person**:
Major Wayne Haygarth
613-290-3816
wayne.haygarth@forces.gc.ca

The Canadian Army, Department of National Defence, is seeking proposals from qualified suppliers to purchase, deliver, and install office furniture to support its operations in Ottawa, Ontario. The tender is open to both domestic and foreign companies.

The selected supplier will be required to provide all necessary furniture, including chairs, desks, and shelving units, as well as installation services. The furniture must meet the Canadian Army's specifications and standards, and the supplier must provide all necessary documentation to prove compliance.

For more information, please refer to the tender documents available on the Buy and Sell website. The tender can be accessed at the following URL: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca](https://canadabuys.canada.ca).

Please note that the tender closing date is December 5, 2024 @ 14:00:00. All proposals must be submitted electronically through the designated portal.

We look forward to receiving your proposal.
